keyPolicies.policyDescription: Dorothy has led the opposition to any downgrading or loss of services at Watford General Hospital.
New leisure centres opened and swimming pools and fitness facilities upgraded in Watford under the Lib Dems.
Watford got a world-class concert hall from the refurbishment of the Colosseum, reopened in 2011.

Planning application should be coming shortly and if approved would mean that the Croxley Rail Link, which has been granted £76 million from the Coalition government, could bring Met Line services to Watford Junction via Vicarage Road.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A recent Ashcroft Poll showed a two-horse race that the Lib Dems and Conservatives.

issues.education: The Lib Dems have given local schools an extra £2.6 million this year to help them teach the poorest children through the Pupil Premium.
